citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
citations.narrative:
Two animals were observed to have excessively long nails. Nails should be trimmed as needed to prevent any
related health concerns.
Correct by February 14, 2014.
An exit briefing was conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
2.33(b)(2)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE.
Two animals were observed to have excessively long nails. Nails should be trimmed as needed to prevent any
related health concerns.
Correct by February 14, 2014.
An exit briefing was conducted with a facility representative.
